name: BalusC
text:
You shouldn't be doing this in a taglib. Rather do it in a [Servlet][1] or [Filter][2], before any bit is been sent to the response. Otherwise you will possible get into `IllegalStateException: response already committed` troubles.


  [1]: https://stackoverflow.com/tags/servlets/info
  [2]: https://stackoverflow.com/tags/servlet-filters/info
